name: Revolution - Say Less, Do More
description:
Warning: In Safari, full screen mode, breaks the game. Use Chrome, download, or play with the minimized game for best results.

Cellrösvár is a nation ruled by a cruel dictatorial regime. That's the way it has been for years. But, now that all your family has either been starved or killed by officers of the state, you demand change. Convince the masses and build a crowd massive enough to storm the palace so that the old regime topples and new leadership can emerge. You must be willing to say whatever, do whatever, the less you hold to your morals, the more allies you can gather.

Gameplay Info:

Use WASD to move.
Click on the dialogue buttons to speak.
Each level you must get enough civilians across the gate to continue. The more you positively influence the crowd, the quicker they follow you. But be careful, after you sound the alarm you only have 10 seconds before the authorities arrive.
